title: GPP#8 - Ghost Partnership Proposal
body:
Proposal Summary 

The proposal is for a partnership with F.Cornejo to make an English review in our Litepaper. 

F.Cornejo has experience in English language documentation reviews, and since our Litepaper wasn’t written by everyday English speaking people, it is important to have his professional review.

● Motivation 
Ensure Litepaper is in proper English.

●Details of the deal: 
Timeframe: 2 weeks to complete 
Work hours: Not measured in hours
Price: 0.048 DAI/word - The Litepaper has 8215 words = 394.32 DAI
Delivery: A google doc w/ comments on english language corrections
Bonus: None
Vesting: No 
Requirement: Need voting (DAI payment)
Budget Origin: Marketing > GFDao Launch



● Relevant Information 

GFDao Litepaper - Ghost Partner Requirements: https://docs.ghost.finance/#499eb724e5654273a4550a3bb3b294ca
choices: YES, I do approve the GPP#8
author: 0x56d78862dcC0bf47C87bdE39BAD9a5A4e9085D00
